title: Carrot pumpkin muffins
ingredients: ['For the muffins', '50g peeled pumpkin without seeds', '200g carrots', '90g light brown soft sugar', '1 egg', '125ml milk', '80ml sunflower oil', '150g plain flour', '2 teaspoons vanilla sugar', '2 teaspoons baking powder', '1/4 teaspoon bicarbonate of soda', '1 teaspoon cinnamon', '1 pinch ground nutmeg', '1 pinch ground ginger', '40g ground nuts', '50g raisins', 'For the icing', '125g mascarpone cheese', '125g icing sugar', '1 lemon, juiced', 'marzipan decoration']
